mapper.sql: TZID, TZH, TZMC, TZLB, JHLX, CFDW, TZJB, ZZHSK, FZRXM, XZZW, XZJB, JSZW, ZW, ZJ, CFGJ1, CFGJ2, CFGJ3, CFGJ4, CFGJ5, FFGZ, TZRS, CFRW, CFSJ, CFTS, SJYS, QTYS, YSHJ, RWPJWH, RWPFSJ, STATUS, VALID, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from T_CG_TZJH
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_CG_TZJH where TZID = #{tzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID = 1
